abstract: Kimberly Brubaker Bradley reviews middle-grade biographies The Plot to Kill Hitler: Dietrich Bonhoeffer: Pastor, Spy, Unlikely Hero by Patricia McCormick and Sachiko: A Nagasaki Bomb Survivor's Story, about Japanese woman Sachiko Yasui, by Caren Stelson.

headline.main: War Stories for Kids: A Pastor for Peace and a Nagasaki Survivor

keywords.value: The Plot to Kill Hitler: Dietrich Bonhoeffer: Pastor, Spy, Unlikely Hero (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: Sachiko: A Nagasaki Bomb Survivor's Story (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: The lives of Dietrich Bonhoeffer and a Nagasaki survivor point to the power of witness and resistance....
lead_paragraph: The lives of Dietrich Bonhoeffer and a Nagasaki survivor point to the power of witness and resistance.
